html: 1.21.21  9:53 pm   at 3:24 of here comes the sun, on the word "world," how does it come to you to do little vocal bits like that, just in general. Where do they come from? same thing at 3:43, the little vocal run on the word "sun" is absolutely fantastic. how do those ideas come to you?
